mode1_p: Join a public game with up to 10 random people. Each player needs to hold 5USD in Bitcat tokens to play. The top five players will compete for weekly rewards.
mode2_p: To create a private game to play with friends you must hold at least 50USD in Bitcat tokens in your wallet which will allow you to create a private room and invite up to 9 other players who access through a private code and must have 5USD in Bitcat tokens to join.
mode3_p: You can bet and win money based on your performance. The money raised will be distributed amongst the top players in the game.
subscribe_paragraph: Participate in promotions and rewards, get the latest news about product launches and upgrades
register_p: To create a private game to play with friends you must hold at least 50USD in Bitcat tokens in your wallet and must have 5USD in Bitcat tokens to join
feedback_p: Provide your ideas, suggestions by clicking this button
